name: demo-ui-medical
description: DEMO UI test scipts using WebdriverIOv6

scripts.test:group-home-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite home
scripts.test:group-biomarker-data-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite biomarker_data
scripts.test:group-dashboard_management-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite dashboard_management
scripts.test:group-rta-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite real_time_analysis
scripts.test:group-rta-p2-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite real_time_analysis_part_2
scripts.test:group-widget-dataset-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite widget_dataset
scripts.test:group-sim-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite sim
scripts.test:group-shipment-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite shipment
scripts.test:group-msi-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite msi
scripts.test:group-fcytometry-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite fcytometry
scripts.test:group-query-tracker-debug: npm run clean:appscreens && DEBUG=true wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite query_tracker
scripts.test-reportportal:group-home: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite home
scripts.test-reportportal:group-biomarker-data: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite biomarker_data
scripts.test-reportportal:dashboard_management: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite dashboard_management
scripts.test-reportportal:rta: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite real_time_analysis
scripts.test-reportportal:widget-dataset: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite widget_dataset
scripts.test-reportportal:sim: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite sim
scripts.test-reportportal:shipment: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite shipment
scripts.test-reportportal:msi: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite msi
scripts.test-reportportal:fcytometry: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite fcytometry
scripts.test-reportportal:query-tracker: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-headless-reportportal.conf.js --suite query_tracker
scripts.test:headless-video-rta-p2: npm run clean:appscreens && SEND_TO_REPORTPORTAL=true wdio ./wdio-videoscreener.conf.js --suite real_time_analysis_part_2

author: Mihaylyuk Vitalii
